actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to provide for improvement of the quality of Boston Harbor and adjacent waters.
subjects: Federal aid to water pollution control

summary.text: Amends the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to direct the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to make grants to the Massachusetts Water Resources Authority for constructing wastewater treatment works for areas served by the Authority. Limits the Federal share of such grants to 75 percent of construction costs. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to provide for improvement of the quality of Boston Harbor and adjacent waters.
